LanguageData.Hungry.label: hungry
LanguageData.Hungry.description: I haven't eaten in a while.
LanguageData.UrgentlyHungry.label: urgently hungry
LanguageData.UrgentlyHungry.description: The hunger pangs are clawing my insides. I need food or I'll starve soon.
LanguageData.Starving.label: starving
LanguageData.Starving.description: I just want something - anything - to eat. I can feel my body wasting away. It hurts...
LanguageData.Tired.label: tired
LanguageData.Tired.description: I haven't slept in a while.
LanguageData.VeryTired.label: very tired
LanguageData.VeryTired.description: I'm so tired. I just want to lay down and rest for a few minutes...
LanguageData.Exhausted.label: exhausted
LanguageData.Exhausted.description: I'm so exhausted I can barely stand. My eyelids have lead weights on them. Let me sleep...
LanguageData.EnvironmentUgly.label: ugly environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentUgly.description: This place is unpleasant to be in.
LanguageData.EnvironmentVeryUgly.label: very ugly environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentVeryUgly.description: This place is really unpleasant. I don't want to be here.
LanguageData.EnvironmentHideous.label: hideous environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentHideous.description: This place is unbearable. Get me out of here...
LanguageData.EnvironmentPretty.label: pleasant environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentVeryPretty.label: very pleasant environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentVeryPretty.description: I really like this place. It's beautiful.
LanguageData.EnvironmentBeautiful.label: beautiful environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentBeautiful.description: This place is beautiful. It lifts me up and makes me love life.
LanguageData.EnvironmentCramped.label: cramped environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentCramped.description: This place is really closed-in. I feel like I have no space to breathe.
LanguageData.EnvironmentVeryCramped.label: very cramped environment
LanguageData.EnvironmentVeryCramped.description: It's claustrophobic in here. I have nowhere to move. I feel like a rat in a tiny cage.
LanguageData.EnvironmentSpaciousInterior.label: spacious interior
LanguageData.EnvironmentSpaciousInterior.description: This is a really comfortably open indoor space.
LanguageData.EnvironmentDark.label: in darkness
LanguageData.EnvironmentDark.description: I've been in the dark for a while. I don't like it.
LanguageData.CabinFeverMild.label: cabin fever (mild)
LanguageData.CabinFeverMild.description: I've been cooped up inside for days. I need to get outside.
LanguageData.CabinFeverSerious.label: cabin fever (serious)
LanguageData.CabinFeverSerious.description: I've been trapped like a rat in here for so long. I desperately need to get outside or I'll go crazy!
LanguageData.Sick.label: sick
LanguageData.Sick.description: I don't feel very well, I'm sick.
